entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 40%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
